title: Bug 102623: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
OB: After importing an image named 'image1.jpg' into layout view, if the image file is deleted from the outline view and then renamed 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg', the image is not refreshed.
EB: After importing an image named 'image1.jpg' into layout view, if the image file is deleted from the outline view and then renamed 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg', the image should be refreshed and displayed in the layout view.
SR:
1. Import an image named 'image1.jpg' into layout view.
2. Delete the image file from the outline view.
3. Rename 'image2.jpg' as 'image1.jpg'.
4. Check if the image is refreshed and displayed in the layout view.
